message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE

This paper deals with natural language processing (NLP) and specifically focuses on measuring the similarity between categories of two pieces of Persian text. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also uses deep neural network models, which are commonly used in machine learning and artificial intelligence, suggesting that cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) is also a likely sub-category. Additionally, the paper involves text classification and information retrieval, which are relevant to cs.IR (Information Retrieval) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). Finally, the use of word embeddings and neural networks suggests that cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing) is also a possible sub-category.
